title: x/mobile: gomobile init fails on el capitan
body:
I'm trying to go through to [gomobile example wiki](https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile) and falling over installing gomobile.

I have go 1.5.1 installed, and when running gomobile init I get a large stack trace relating to Appkit.framework. See below.

Has anyone had this issue?

Mac OS X 10.11.1 (El Capitan) - Was an upgrade from Yosemite.
go version go1.5.1 darwin/amd64
gomobile version +6295a61 Tue Nov 24 15:52:38 2015 +0000 (android,ios); androidSDK=

gomobile init partial output - http://pastebin.com/P3qqkCK2

Cheers!
